patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-874
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo
  name: mongo-controller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:3.4.10
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - name: mongo
          containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - name: mongo-persistent-storage
          mountPath: /data/db
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodata

apiVersion: v1

metadata:

        - name: mongo-persistent-storage

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: inline-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:stable
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: nginx-inline
    volumeMounts:
    - name: my-csi-volume
      mountPath: /var/lib/www/html
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  volumes:
  - name: my-csi-volume
    csi:
      driver: cinder.csi.openstack.org
      volumeAttributes:
        capacity: 1Gi
      readOnly: false
      fsType: ext4

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ecsdemo-nodejs
  labels:
    app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ecsdemo-nodejs
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: brentley/ecsdemo-nodejs:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ecsdemo-nodejs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
